name: Escape Earth (Vedal)
description:
For Ludum Dare 42, based on the "Running out of space" theme.

The world is suffering from overpopulation and on the first step to leaving Earth completely, you must learn to escape it.

Controls:

To build, click on the blue dots and then the object you wish to add.
W/S: Increase/Decrease throttle
A/D: Turn left/right
Space: Activate next stage
Mouse Wheel: Zoom in/out

For your rocket to launch you must have activated the stage and increased the throttle!
